revision.text: The Egg Pool split works like this: * 50% chance of getting a Pokemon from the furthest region you've been to (odds split evenly for each possible Pokemon from the furthest region reached) * Remaining 50% is split among all previous region egg pool Pokemon, favoring more recent regions. See the [[Egg#Helpful_Info|Helpful Info]] section below for more details.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
